snippet.title: MARS 2120 - Update Trailer
snippet.description:
#QUByteConnect2024

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1424290/MARS_2120/

Released this year on Steam, PlayStation 4 and 5, Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, and Nintendo Switch, MARS 2120 is receiving a major update! This metroidvania-style game combines melee and ranged combat, inspired by classics like Super Metroid, Castlevania: Symphony of the Night, and Guacamelee! Join Anna "Thirteen" Charlotte as she battles her way through the secrets of Mars.
